questions.question: Q1. What is the SI unit of impedance?
Q2. ___________ is known as inverse impedance?
Q3. Nyquist stability is based on the principle of _______________.
Q4. In electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS), the magnetization branch of an equivalent circuit of a transformer is drawn in __________ with supply voltage?
Q5. A __________ electrode cell is used to analyze processes occurring within the electrolytes.
Q6. What is the basic difference between polar and Nyquist plots?
Q7. The _____________ were used to extract the physically meaningful model parameters to evaluate the electrochemical behavior of the redox probe SPCE system?
Q8. In potentiostatic mode, experiments are done at a fixed __________ potential.
